snippet: The candidate, Karen Turner, placed second in the three-way race.
abstract: Montclair, NJ, voters elect real estate developer Robert Jackson as mayor, rejecting candidate Karen Turner, who had put forth a platform of reduced spending in a campaign that largely reflected the national debate over spending.
lead_paragraph: The candidate, Karen Turner, placed second in the three-way race.

headline.seo: Montclair Rejects Candidate Seeking to Reduce Spending
headline.main: Montclair Rejects Candidate Seeking to Reduce Spending
headline.print_headline: Montclair Rejects Candidate Seeking to Reduce Spending
